front.title: Military Message Handling System (MMHS) over SMTP

abstract.t: A Miltary Message Handling System (MMHS) processes formal messages ensuring release, distribution, security, and timely delivery across national and international strategic and tactical networks. The MMHS Elements of Service are defined as a set of extensions to the ITU-T X.400 (1992) international standards and are specified in STANAG 4406 Edition 2 or ACP 123. This document specifies how a comparable messaging service can be provided using SMTP and its extensions.
